title: 23 useless champion shards :(
body:
I own every single champion to date and when ever i buy 10+ chests/Keys.  i always feel ripped off every time i get a champion shard because they useless for me.

I cant disenchant for essence and use them for other purposes because blue essence is only used for champions.

Would RIOT be able to make it so your unable to get champion shards when you already own every single champion?

replies.body:
As of now there is no use of Essence or Shards if you own every champ, and is just dismissed as a "risk of purchase". Because if we were guaranteed something unique or new then chests would become a broken system to earn skins, wards, and icons cheaper and faster than waiting for sales or for them to come out of the legacy vault.  

I understand your pain I really do but unless there becomes a 'blue to orange conversion' there will probably never be anything to compensate for your loss.

Sorry man. It'd be way too broken if it changed that drastically.
